articles.description: No discernible plan. No identity. No improvement. With one year until the World Cup, how far off are Thomas Tuchel's England?
articles.title: One year to World Cup, have Thomas Tuchel's England regressed since Southgate?

articles.description: England blast their way to record score on home soil as they wrap up an emphatic series clean sweep with a 37-run win over West Indies in the third T20.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Ben Duckett and Jamie blast fifties as hosts seal T20 series clean sweep

articles.description: Lando Norris tells BBC Sport why being "a great team-mate" helps keep the harmony within McLaren and discusses the challenge of racing against Max Verstappen.
articles.title: Lando Norris on racing against Max Verstappen, Oscar Piastri and finding it hard to say he is 'the best'

articles.description: Manchester City sign France midfielder Rayan Cherki from Lyon, but who is he exactly and why is everybody so excited about him?
articles.title: Rayan Cherki: 'One of Europe's greatest technicians' - why Man City signed French 'genius'

articles.description: With £400m spent, who signed who in the early transfer window before the Club World Cup starts?
articles.title: Premier League: Clubs spend £400m in mini transfer window with early deals

articles.description: Life has taken a surreal turn for Tyler Weaver, a 20-year-old amateur from Suffolk, who makes his major debut in this week's US Open at Oakmont, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: US Open at Oakmont: English amateur Tyler Weaver learns from Brooks Koepka on major debut

articles.description: New Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers - on his first day with the team - reveals he had a secret wedding earlier this year.
articles.title: Aaron Rodgers reveals secret wedding on his first day with Pittsburgh Steelers

articles.description: Chelsea have an offer worth more than £42m for English winger Jamie Gittens rejected by Borussia Dortmund.
articles.title: Jamie Gittens: Chelsea have £42m bid for Borussia Dortmund winger rejected

articles.description: Watch live coverage of Northern Ireland's match with Iceland at Windsor Park in a final friendly before World Cup qualifying in September.
articles.title: Watch live coverage of Northern Ireland's friendly with Iceland at Windsor Park

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says his recent loss of form has helped him realise he needs to "get my stuff together" after struggling for motivation following his career-defining Masters win.
articles.title: US Open: Time to 'get my stuff together' after post-Masters dip, says Rory McIlroy
